manifest:
builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  type: web
  app-group: estafette-ci
  team: estafette-team
  language: nodejs

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 1

stages:
  audit-and-restore:
    parallelStages:
      audit:
        image: extensions/npm-audit:dev
        action: audit
        dev-level: moderate
        workspace: estafette
        channels:
        - '#npm-audit'

      restore:
        image: node:13.6.0-alpine
        commands:
        - npm ci

  lint-and-build:
    parallelStages:
      lint:
        image: node:13.6.0-alpine
        commands:
        - npm run lint

      build:
        image: node:13.6.0-alpine
        commands:
        - npm run build

  bake:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    action: build
    repositories:
    - estafette
    path: ./dist
    copy:
    - favicon.ico
    - nginx.vh.default.conf
    - docker-entrypoint.sh
    - package-lock.json

  check-container:
    parallelStages:
      check-efficiency:
        image: extensions/docker:dev
        action: dive
        repositories:
        - estafette

      vulnerability-scan:
        image: extensions/docker:dev
        action: trivy
        repositories:
        - estafette

  test:
    services:
    - name: ci.estafette.io
      image: estafette/estafette-ci-web:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
      readiness:
        path: /robots.txt
        port: 5000

    image: node:13.6.0-alpine
    commands:
    - apk add curl
    - curl --fail http://ci.estafette.io:5000/manifest/encrypt

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    retries: 5
    action: push
    repositories:
    - estafette

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    workspace: estafette
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' ||
      status == 'failed'

releases:
  tooling-estafette:
    clone: true
    stages:
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:dev
        namespace: estafette-ci
        visibility: iap
        iapOauthClientID: ***
        iapOauthClientSecret: ***
        container:
          repository: estafette
          cpu:
            request: 10m
            limit: 200m
          memory:
            request: 15Mi
            limit: 512Mi
          liveness:
            path: /robots.txt
          readiness:
            path: /robots.txt
          metrics:
            scrape: false
        hosts:
        - ***
        - ***
        chaosproof: true
        manifests:
          files:
          - gke/ingress.yaml

      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
        workspace: estafette
        channels:
        - '#build-status'
        when:
          status == 'succeeded' ||
          status == 'failed'
manifestWithDefaults:
builder:
  track: dev
  os: linux
labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  language: nodejs
  team: estafette-team
  type: web
version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 1
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master
stages:
  audit-and-restore:
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    parallelStages:
    - image: extensions/npm-audit:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: audit
      channels:
      - '#npm-audit'
      dev-level: moderate
      workspace: estafette
    - image: node:13.6.0-alpine
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      commands:
      - npm ci
      when: status == 'succeeded'
  lint-and-build:
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    parallelStages:
    - image: node:13.6.0-alpine
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      commands:
      - npm run lint
      when: status == 'succeeded'
    - image: node:13.6.0-alpine
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      commands:
      - npm run build
      when: status == 'succeeded'
  bake:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    action: build
    copy:
    - favicon.ico
    - nginx.vh.default.conf
    - docker-entrypoint.sh
    - package-lock.json
    path: ./dist
    repositories:
    - estafette
  check-container:
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    parallelStages:
    - image: extensions/docker:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: dive
      repositories:
      - estafette
    - image: extensions/docker:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: trivy
      repositories:
      - estafette
  test:
    image: node:13.6.0-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - apk add curl
    - curl --fail http://ci.estafette.io:5000/manifest/encrypt
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    services:
    - name: ci.estafette.io
      image: estafette/estafette-ci-web:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
      shell: /bin/sh
      multiStage: false
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      readiness:
        path: /robots.txt
        timeoutSeconds: 60
        port: 5000
        protocol: http
        hostname: ci.estafette.io
  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    retries: 5
    action: push
    repositories:
    - estafette
  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded' || status == 'failed'
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    workspace: estafette
releases:
  tooling-estafette:
    stages:
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded'
        chaosproof: true
        container:
          cpu:
            limit: 200m
            request: 10m
          liveness:
            path: /robots.txt
          memory:
            limit: 512Mi
            request: 15Mi
          metrics:
            scrape: false
          readiness:
            path: /robots.txt
          repository: estafette
        hosts:
        - ***
        - ***
        iapOauthClientID: ***
        iapOauthClientSecret: ***
        manifests:
          files:
          - gke/ingress.yaml
        namespace: estafette-ci
        visibility: iap
      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded' || status == 'failed'
        channels:
        - '#build-status'
        workspace: estafette
